# SCOPfunctions

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

An R package of functions for single cell -omics analysis. Mostly wrappers around Seurat and Bioconductor packages.

## Installation

You can install the development version of SCOPfunctions with:

```
devtools::install_github("CBMR-Single-Cell-Omics-Platform/SCOPfunctions")
```
